TopicTitle: When Restarting wifi the Game Data is Deleted and the Game Freezes on Loading Screens.

Articles.Content:
Reported Version: v0.2.2 (latest) | Mods: none | Can replicate without mods? Yes 
OS: Windows 11 | CPU: 12th Gen Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-12400F) | GPU: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1650 | RAM: 16GB

 

Hola tengo algunos problemas con KSP 2, cuando reinicio mi wifi se borran los datos del juego y el juego se bloquea en las pantallas de carga cuando cargan los crateres

Anth Edit: Translation: Hello, I have some problems with KSP 2, when I restart my wifi the game data is deleted and the game freezes on the loading screens when the craters load.

Edited Monday at 02:40 AM by Anth
Adding translation

@Davdev I don't know if google translated your bug report correctly but I did some testing with disconnecting from the internet and restarting my internet router and there was no problems with the game.

As far as I know KSP2 development stopped after the 28th of June so if there is an issue it may never be fixed.

Edited Monday at 05:11 AM by Anth
